project_abstract.cdata: The Yangtze Flood Emergency Rehabilitation Project aims to rebuild social and economic infrastructure damaged by the devastating floods in Hubei, Hunan, and Jiangxi provinces, thereby rapidly restoring economic production and social services. In the project design, priority has been given to restoring and rebuilding the water supply and health facilities to prevent the spread of diseases after the floods, and roads to restore key access to the flooded areas so as to regenerate economic activities. The main components are restoration and reconstruction of roads, water supply systems, county and township secondary and primary schools, hospitals, health centers and clinics, and irrigation systems. The project also provides for each province to upgrade existing or developing flood forecasting, and simulation and dispatch systems, taking into account the recent flood experience.

P063123.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>长江洪水紧急恢复项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>项目的目的是迅速重建湖北、湖南、江西三省的社会和经济基础设施，从而恢复经济和社会活动。项目贷款将用于恢复重建945公里的84条县级和农村道路，恢复重建55个供水系统，保证近250万人口的安全饮用水供应，恢复重建146所县级和镇级医院、保健中心、卫生所和194所中小学。项目贷款还将用于恢复为44200公顷农田提供灌溉用水的18个灌区，据估计受益农民人数达44.6万人。此外，项目还将资助计算机模拟系统改善洪水预测、模拟和管理工作。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
